Gunther's there are no EMP weapons. =)


On 12 May 2001, at 19:13, gunthers8@... wrote:

> ::FireBlade::
> FireBLade heard NightStrikes invitation.
> 'About time I was invited to boogy down' he replied running over the
> hill he had stood behind for so long.  He took out his rifle and
> pulled out his montrous blade.  With his energy rifle he shot 10 shots
> at the mutated IR.  At the same time he pointed his sword at IR and
> sueezed the hilt with a proper amount of pressure and the sword opened
> like a mouth and shot one of two missiles designed by FireBlade. The
> missile would explode once within 10 m of an enemy signature. All at
> once in hte explosion would be an EMP blast plus liquid fire at 1000
> plus degress C.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > Nightstrike:
> >
> > "Nightstrike to Megatron" said the male using his comm link "I
> > locate the target but I need someone to cover me... I have a party
> > here and I like invite someone to join... "
